bio: Usapyon put on some racing gear. It seems its important to be able to drive really fast up in space.

soultimate.name: Road Rage
soultimate.description: Summon a racecar, dealing heavy damage to foes.

skill.effect: Spd ↑ when attacking, 0.8% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
skill.name: Pedal to the Metal

name: Racing Usapyon
